name: Chromatography
description:
So around 4 months ago, I talked about a RGB game in Abandonned Games. I forgot about it after some work on it, but it didn't really matter because of how tedious it was.

And now, 2 years later, I remade it for Finally Finish Something 2023. I think it plays a lot better now, but I didn't had a lot of ideas for that game to be fair.

Source code

https://auroriax.github.io/PuzzleScript/play.html?p=798fa0c157d4ad5f1bf5dbc0865d8d88

Controls

Arrow keys to move
X to select
Z to undo, R to restart
